# Mermaid test (Material theme)

## Mermaid usual
This is a test of Mermaid:

```mermaid
graph TD
    hello --> world
    world --> world2
```

> If you don't see a graph here, it's broken.

## Git Graph
This is a test of Git Graph: 

```mermaid
gitGraph
    commit
    commit
    branch develop
    checkout develop
    commit
    commit
    checkout main
    merge develop
    commit
    commit
```


## Normal fences
This is usual fenced code (with no highlighting)

```python
for page in pages:
    page.read()
```
